casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Larry McLeod PULLEY. No. 42P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of February 2006 by Defendant for Disposition Order or Judgment in the Foresaid Case:

*516"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
